name: api_physics2d_Joint2D
description: Parent class for joints to connect Rigidbody2D objects.

properties.name: attachedRigidbody
properties.description: The Rigidbody2D attached to the Joint2D.

properties.name: breakAction
properties.description: The action to take when the joint breaks the breakForce or breakTorque.

properties.name: breakForce
properties.description: The force that needs to be applied for this joint to break.

properties.name: breakTorque
properties.description: The torque that needs to be applied for this joint to break.

properties.name: connectedBody
properties.description: The Rigidbody2D object to which the other end of the joint is attached (ie, the object without the joint component).

properties.name: enableCollision
properties.description: Should the two Rigidbody2D connected with this joint collide with each other?

properties.name: reactionForce
properties.description: Gets the reaction force of the joint.

properties.name: reactionTorque
properties.description: Gets the reaction torque of the joint.

properties.name: GetReactionForce
properties.description: Gets the reaction force of the joint given the specified timeStep.

properties.name: GetReactionTorque
properties.description: Gets the reaction torque of the joint given the specified timeStep.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.

properties.name: InstantiateAsync
properties.description: Captures a snapshot of the original object (that must be related to some GameObject) and returns the AsyncInstantiateOperation.
